mapper.select: select distinct a.*, b.name as new_spare_part_name, b.specifications, c.name as device_name, da.material_name as old_spare_part_name, b.specifications from device_change_spare_part a LEFT JOIN material_base b ON (a.material_base_code = b.`code` and b.del_flag = 0) LEFT JOIN device c on c.code = a.device_code LEFT join device_assembly da on (a.old_spare_part_code = da.`code` AND a.del_flag = 0 AND da.device_code = c.`code`) where a.code = #{faultCode} and a.del_flag = 0

select sum(ifnull(dcsp.new_spare_part_num,0)) num, mb.name spare_name from device_change_spare_part dcsp LEFT join material_base mb on dcsp.new_spare_part_code = mb.code where dcsp.create_time between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and mb.name is not NULL GROUP BY dcsp.new_spare_part_code order by num DESC limit 5

select b.NAME AS new_spare_part_name, c.material_name AS old_spare_part_name, a.old_spare_part_num, a.new_spare_part_num from device_change_spare_part a LEFT JOIN material_base b ON (a.new_spare_part_code = b.`code` and b.del_flag = 0) LEFT JOIN device_assembly c ON ( a.old_spare_part_code = c.`code` AND c.del_flag = 1 and c.device_code = a.device_code) where a.code = #{faultCode} and a.consumables = 0 and a.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY c.material_name

select a.device_code, a.old_org_code, a.old_spare_part_code, a.old_spare_part_num, a.new_spare_part_num, mrd.materials_code as newSparePartCode, sum(mrd.apply_num) as applyNum, b.name as new_spare_part_name, b.specifications, c.name as device_name, da.material_name as old_spare_part_name, b.specifications from material_requisition_detail mrd left join material_requisition mr on mrd.material_requisition_id = mr.id LEFT JOIN device_change_spare_part a on (a.material_base_code = mrd.materials_code and a.repair_record_id = mr.fault_repair_record_id) LEFT JOIN material_base b ON (a.material_base_code = b.`code` and b.del_flag = 0) LEFT JOIN device c on c.code = a.device_code LEFT join device_assembly da on (a.old_spare_part_code = da.`code` AND a.del_flag = 0 AND da.device_code = c.`code`) where a.code = #{faultCode} and a.repair_record_id = #{recordId} and mr.fault_repair_record_id = #{recordId} and a.del_flag = 0 and mrd.del_flag = 0 group by mr.apply_warehouse_code,mrd.materials_code
